# ğŸ¤ AloneMusic Code of Conduct

Welcome to **AloneMusic**, a community-driven open-source project.  
We want our community to be **friendly, inclusive, and safe** for everyone.

This document outlines the standards of behavior that all community participants are expected to follow.

## ğŸ’¬ Our Pledge
In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment,  
we pledge to make participation in this project a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of:
- Age
- Gender identity or expression
- Race or ethnicity
- Religion or belief
- Sexual orientation
- Disability
- Level of technical experience

---

## âœ… Our Standards
Examples of positive behavior include:
- Using respectful and inclusive language.
- Being empathetic toward other community members.
- Accepting constructive criticism gracefully.
- Focusing on whatâ€™s best for the project.
- Showing kindness and understanding.

Unacceptable behaviors include:
- Harassment, trolling, or personal attacks.
- Public or private sexual harassment.
- Discrimination or hate speech.
- Publishing othersâ€™ private information without consent.
- Persistent disruptive behavior.

## ğŸ‘‘ Responsibilities of Maintainers
Project maintainers are responsible for:
- Clarifying acceptable behavior.
- Taking appropriate action for unacceptable behavior.
- Temporarily or permanently banning contributors who violate the rules.

## âš ï¸ Enforcement
Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting:
- **Project Maintainers:** [Open a private issue](../../issues)

All complaints will be reviewed fairly and kept confidential.
